resources.string: 9 to 5 fitness trainer is designed to help professionals to keep their body fit by taking care of their neck, back, eyes and wrist. \n\nThis app is verified by eye specialists and orthopaedics experts.

This app is made by extensive research on problems related to professionals and is verified by the experts in the field of orthopaedics and eye experts.

The image content for this app is downloaded from various websites.

The app is mainly designed to help professionals suffering from back and shoulder pain and also to those want to take care fo their back, neck, shoulder and eyes.
You will receive notifications and reminders for exercise after every fixed duration.\n
